channel.title: CVE Feed for WAGO -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAGO -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5188|2023-12-14T14:09:31.201Z -- wago -- telecontrol%20configurator
item.description: The MMS Interpreter of WagoAppRTU in versions below 1.4.6.0 which is used by the WAGO Telecontrol Configurator is vulnerable to malformed packets. An remote unauthenticated attacker could send specifically crafted packets that lead to a denial-of-service condition until restart of the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2023-1619|2023-06-26T06:18:33.981Z -- wago -- 750-8202%2Fxxx-xxx
item.description: Multiple WAGO devices in multiple versions may allow an authenticated remote attacker with high privileges to DoS the device by sending a malformed packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-1150|2023-06-26T06:19:53.942Z -- wago -- 750-332
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in Series WAGO 750-3x/-8x products may allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to DoS the MODBUS server with specially crafted packets.

item.title: CVE-2023-1698|2023-05-15T08:51:27.453Z -- wago -- compact%20controller%20cc100
item.description: In multiple products of WAGO a vulnerability allows an unauthenticated, remote attacker to create new users and change the device configuration which can result in unintended behaviour, Denial of Service and full system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2023-1620|2023-06-26T06:19:30.928Z -- wago -- 750-8202%2Fxxx-xxx
item.description: Multiple WAGO devices in multiple versions may allow an authenticated remote attacker with high privileges to DoS the device by sending a specifically crafted packet to the CODESYS V2 runtime.

item.title: CVE-2023-4089|2023-10-17T06:00:28.908Z -- wago -- compact%20controller%20cc100
item.description: On affected Wago products an remote attacker with administrative privileges can access files to which he has already access to through an undocumented local file inclusion. This access is logged in a different log file than expected.

item.title: CVE-2023-4149|2023-11-21T07:00:25.240Z -- wago -- industrial%20managed%20switch%20%280852-0602%29
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to inject arbitrary system commands and gain full system control. Those commands are executed with root privileges. The vulnerability is located in the user request handling of the web-based management.

item.title: CVE-2023-3379|2023-11-20T07:23:41.887Z -- wago -- compact%20controller%20100%20%28751-9301%29
item.description: Wago web-based management of multiple products has a vulnerability which allows an local authenticated attacker to change the passwords of other non-admin users and thus to escalate non-root privileges.
